get.summary: Retrieve information about a specific blockchain.
Fetch information about all supported blockchains.
Get details of a specific DEX factory on a particular blockchain.
Obtain information about all DEXs on a specified blockchain.
Fetch details of a specific liquidity pool on a particular blockchain.
Retrieve liquidity information of a specific pool.
Get the score of a specific liquidity pool.
Fetch price information of a specific liquidity pool.
Fetch locks information of a specific liquidity pool.
Obtain information about all liquidity pools on a specified blockchain.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: From filter, for date sort filter type (creationTime) must be in ISO format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX), for number based sort filter (creationBlock) type must be a number

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: To filter, for date sort filter type (creationTime) must be in ISO format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX), for number based sort filter (creationBlock) type must be a number

get.summary: Retrieve details of a specific token on a particular blockchain.
Get lock information of a specific token.
Fetch the score of a specific token.
Obtain additional information about a specific token.
Retrieve price information of a specific token.
Retrieve audit information of a specific token.
Get information about all tokens on a specified blockchain.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: From filter, for date sort filter type (socialsInfoUpdated, creationTime) must be in ISO format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX), for number based sort filter type (creationBlock) must be a number

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: To filter, for date sort filter type (socialsInfoUpdated, creationTime) must be in ISO format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX), for number based sort filter type (creationBlock) must be a number

get.summary: Fetch information about all liquidity pools associated with a specific token.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: From filter, for date sort filter type (creationTime) must be in ISO format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX), for number based sort filter type (creationBlock) must be a number

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: To filter, for date sort filter type (creationTime) must be in ISO format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX), for number based sort filter type (creationBlock) must be a number

get.summary: Retrieve a list of hot liquidity pools on a particular blockchain.
Get a list of tokens that have gained the most in value.
Fetch a list of tokens that have lost the most in value.

info.title: DEXTools API
info.description:
Welcome to DEXTools API: the gateway to DeFi

Seize the power of exhaustive data, and craft market strategies that lead, not follow. Let's redefine crypto trading, together.

  • Subscribe and get your API key in our website
  • Available real-time DeFi data for +80 blockchains, +10K DEXâ€™s and +2M tokens and liquidity pools.
  • Query DEXTools' exclusive HotPairs ranking and tokens social information.
  • Pay with crypto available, contact us by email.
  • For support please contact to our Telegram's Support Channel or mail
